kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serve_rest, url=https://serverest.dev, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://serverest.dev/login path_url=/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.4', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '68', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "vinicius.trindade@teste.com.br", "password": "123456789"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.
